headline: Where are the experienced Computer Science graduates working?
description: We're trying to hire an experienced (5+ years xp) front end developer (web-based) and a tiny number of the candidates I've seen have Computer Science degrees. As someone who did Undergraduate CS and recently followed it up with a Masters this is confusing. I always thought of CS as the degree for software developers. Is front end development not something CS graduates are interested in anymore? Or is there too much competition from all the boot camp graduates?
description_zh-Hans: 我们正试图招聘一名有经验的（5年以上xp）前端开发员（基于网络），而我所看到的候选人中只有极少数人有计算机科学学位。作为一个在本科阶段学习了CS并在最近获得了硕士学位的人来说，这很令人困惑。我一直认为CS是软件开发人员的学位。前端设计是什么？ [...]
description_zh-Hant: 我們正試圖招聘一名有經驗的（5年以上xp）前端開發員（基於網絡），而我所看到的候選人中只有極少數人有計算機科學學位。作為一個在本科階段學習了CS並在最近獲得了碩士學位的人來說，這很令人困惑。我一直認為CS是軟件開發人員的學位。前端設計是什麼？ [...]
